offer.title: Engine Tune Up
offer.details:
Replace spark plugs.
Reg. price 279.95 + tax
& shop supplies.
offer.disclaimer: Must be presented at time of write-up. Only applicable to 4 cylinder models.  Some models may be slightly higher. Not valid with any other offers or in-store specials. Does not include sales tax and hazardous waste disposal fees. Not retroactive. No cash value. See dealer for details. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. Void where prohibited. See your service professional at Global Imports BMW for details.
